actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Indian Affairs.
Committee on Indian Affairs. Committee consideration and Mark Up Session held.
Committee on Indian Affairs. Ordered to be reported with amendments favorably.
Committee on Indian Affairs. Reported to Senate by Senator Cohen under the authority of the order of Jul  1, 82 with amendments. With written report No. 97-492.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 702.
Passed Senate with amendments by Voice Vote.

House Agreed to Senate Amendments to House Amendments.

official_title: An act to provide for the use and distribution of funds awarded to the Blackfeet and Gros Ventre Tribes of Indians and the Assiniboine Tribe of Fort Belknap Indian Community, in certain dockets of the United States Court of Claims and of funds awarded to the Papago Tribe of Arizona in dockets numbered 345 and 102 of the Indian Claims Commission, and for other purposes.

summary.as: Senate agreed to House amendment with amendment
summary.text: (Senate agreed to House amendment with an amendment) Provides for the use and distribution of funds awarded in specified cases by the United States Court of Claims to: (1) the Blackfeet Tribe of the Blackfeet Reservation, Montana; (2) the Assiniboine Tribe of the Fort Belknap Indian Community, Montana; (3) the Gros Ventre Tribe of the Fort Belknap Indian Community, Montana; and (4) the Papago Tribe of Arizona. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to prescribe rules and regulations to carry out this Act, including the establishment of deadlines for filing applications for enrollment.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the use and distribution of funds awarded the Blackfeet and Gros Ventre Tribes of Indians and the Assiniboine Tribe of the Fort Belknap Indian Community, et al. in dockets numbered 250-A and 279-C by the United States Court of Claims, and for other purposes.

An act to provide for the use and distribution of funds awarded to the Blackfeet and Gros Ventre Tribes of Indians and the Assiniboine Tribe of Fort Belknap Indian Community, in certain dockets of the United States Court of Claims and of funds awarded to the Papago Tribe of Arizona in dockets numbered 345 and 102 of the Indian Claims Commission, and for other purposes.
